purpose: The email announces the acceptance of eight workshops that will be co-located with the 41st International Conference on Logic Programming (ICLP 2025) at the University of Calabria, Italy, from September 12 to September 19, 2025. It provides a brief overview of each workshop, including their topics and links to their respective websites. The workshops cover a range of areas related to logic programming, including theory, implementation, and applications, and the calls for paper submissions are currently open.

evidence_sentences: ICLP 2025, the 41st International Conference on Logic Programming, will be held at the University of Calabria, Rende, Italy, from September 12 to September 19, 2025.
This year, we are pleased to announce that eight workshops will be co-located with ICLP 2025.
Below is the list of the accepted workshops, along with short descriptions and links to their respective websites.
The calls for paper submission are open.
